```{r}
filtered <- read_rds("filtered_data.rds")

```


```{r}
create_outlier_boxplot <- function(data, col_name) {
  ggplot(data, aes_string(y = col_name)) +
    geom_boxplot(outlier.color = "red",   
                 outlier.shape = 16,      
                 outlier.size = 2) +      
    labs(title = paste("Boxplot of", col_name, "with Outliers"),
         y = col_name) +
    theme_minimal()
}
create_outlier_boxplot(filtered, filtered$C4_RACEte)
```
